channel.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I just wanna Talk about The Marines' Uniforms
First Off What's With the Beret Flash? The HECU always wore this Flash and not this Green Flash as shown in the Media Section, this is the flash they wore in all the Half Life Games. ![](upload://66whDp5oakPw1XeZQpLgsOGQc1W.png)
Secondly, what's with the Generic Camo? What was wrong with the Original Camo they wore as seen on this texture sheet and in the original concept art? ![](upload://kfnryQh2m8JtkO7s6p5eF5BmcJS.jpeg)![](upload://1FiJSeWLO5fnh6IAZNozJcsx7EM.png)

item.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
item.dc:creator: JamesKane
item.description:
The design is final. If you have a problem with it then make your own model or obtain one.

Read full topic

item.source: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?

item.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
I think the discussion is hilarious because although its an emblem, it is not as significant as completely altering the look of the HECU all together, and with that people are accepting. But for some reason some of you decided that the hard-to-notice emblem went way too far and beyond the line. If it bothers you so much edit the model on release, you may even learn something while doing it.

The fact that some view the current design as an error is even funnier. Im surprised this is still being discussed.

Read full topic

item.source: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?

item.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
baconeggs:

The OP started with a massive image of the logo, surely that’s easy enough to make a high-res texture out of?

I believe Raminator was saying that they won’t do it because they already finish the Marine Commander model and it’s not worth going to revisit it.

Can’t say I blame them though. After 5 years of working on this I wouldn’t want to go back to a ‘finished’ model to fix such a minor error.

Read full topic

item.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
RabidMonkey:

Yes, that is the ONLY place you see that logo, so I don’t understand the big fuss. It’s not like HL2 or something where the combine logo is plastered everywhere on the characters and also in the world.

At least do the devs have the image of the beret symbol in righ res to fix this?

Now we need the BM version to replace the half-life’s version in the wiki

Read full topic

item.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
item.dc:creator: Gilboron
item.description:
You know, they’re just putting up this facade of laziness while behind the scenes they are making the new HECU symbol appear on almost every texture in the game, so that it would be nigh impossible to change them all to the HL1 one.

Read full topic
item.source: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?

item.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
Raminator:

I don’t think laziness is the correct word, it’s just a case of balancing effort versus reward. There’s honestly no point in revisiting assets that have been finalised for a long time for such an inconsequential detail.

Well put, you’ve clearly recognised the laziness I display when posting.

Read full topic

item.source: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?

item.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
baconeggs:

If some people wanted all stop signs to be orange instead of red and no-one else cared, do you honestly think the council would go about changing all stop signs to orange?

That’s a terrible comparison.

The cost for changing all the stop signs would be immense and would take a long time to do, not to mention the stop sign is one of the most easily recognised signs in existence.

Changing the logo would take at best 5 minutes to do, you only have to change a couple textures, and either logo isn’t recognised by everyone anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?

item.title: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
Gilboron:

But that’s my point: it’s not an unpleasable fanbase. Group X wants Z changed, Group Y doesn’t care. If you change it, everyone’s happy. I honestly doubt ANYONE is going to be like “but teh horse is the devs orignal vishun!!!”.

If some people wanted all stop signs to be orange instead of red and no-one else cared, do you honestly think the council would go about changing all stop signs to orange?

Read full topic
item.source: HECU Marines Uniform Design Not To Canon?
